```{r}
n = 10
X = cbind(runif(n,0,10), runif(n,0,10), runif(n,0,10))

colnames(X) = c("x", "w", "z")
Y = X[,1]^2 + X[,2] - 3*X[,3]
data =cbind(Y,X)
colnames(data) = c("y", colnames(X))
```


```{r}
form = formula_hal("y ~  .^2", smoothness_orders=1, data, bins = 3)

form


```





```{r}

fit = fit(form)

summary(fit, vim = T, plot_vim = T)
```
